description: Asami is a friend of Sana`s and is in her second year. Asami seems to have a very gentle personality, and even volunteers at an old folk`s home; she often asks Sana to come too, who is happy to oblige. However, she actually has a very vindictive personality and will go to great lengths in order to get even with someone who hurt her.
name: Hoshino Asami
